name: Diavolas
description:
Diavolas is a hack and slash almost RPG built for Retrograde Jam 2. It's built using Monogame and SadConsole, with audiovisual elements largely sourced from online sources with permissive licenses.

Gameplay involves traveling to the right over three different environments, fighting goblins and skeletons. Movement controls are either WASD or the Arrow keys. The game makes reference to A and B. A is either Z or J, and B either X or K. The A button invokes your basic attack. The B button and a direction does one of four special abilities. After defeating all enemies in a level, you spend your red and blue drops to increase either your health or your abilities.
